unnormalised: Boro, tor tumi Bharotantlea odhikrut pot'te sodun kaddpache vixayant vichartat, hoinam? Tem kednaim tricky zaunk xakta. Samanyoponnan, tumi sodtat tea vibhagachem vo sonsthechem odhikrut vebsaitt ekdam polleun gheop hem ut'tom sthan asta. Udharonnak, zori tumi Mumbai-ntlea Inkum Toks Vibhagacho pot'to sodtat, tor tumi incometax.gov.in polloat ani tanchi samporkachi mahiti sodhat. Fokot random Google-cher vixvas dovrunk naka, boro?
normalised: Boro, mhunnllear tum Bharotantleo odhikrut pot'teo sodun kaddpache vixoyicher vichartat, borabor? Tem ked'dam-i trasdaik zaunk xokta. Samanyponnan, survat korpak ut'tom zago mhunnllear tum sodtat tea vibhagachi vo songhottnachi odhikrut website. Udahoronnak, tum Mumboichea Utpon'nokor Vibhagacho pot'to sodtat zalear, tum incometax dot gov dot in check kortole ani tankam samporkachi mahiti sodtole. Fodd'ddi Google sodacheruch visvas dovrunk naka, boro?

unnormalised: Dusri vostu monant dhorpachi mhonnllear Bharotantle pot'te odhik dhyan diun boroitat. Tumkam "CGO Complex, Lodhi Road, New Delhi, 110003" vo "4th Floor, MTNL Building, Bandra (W), Mumbai - 400050" oxem dista. Tumkam dilem promannem exact-tech boroun gheunk zai, khas korun PIN kod. Ho PIN kod postmanak khup mhotvacho!
normalised: Dusri gosth monant dovrunk zai ti mhunnllear Bharotantle pot'te choddkorun vistarann dile'le astat. Tumkam "C-G-O Complex, Lodhi Road, New Delhi, ek xem dha hozar ani tin" vo "fourth Floor, M-T-N-L Building, Bandra (W), Mumbai - char xem hozar ani pon'nas" oxem distolem. Tumchea lagim dilem tea promannem sogllem nirdharit korun borounk zai, khas korun P-I-N code. To P-I-N code postmanak khub mhotvacho!

unnormalised: Toxench, yad dovrat ki sarkarachea ofisanchea veg-vegllea shakha vo pradeshik ofisam astat. Mukhel ofisacho pot'to tumchea sthanik shakhacho pot'tayan vegllaso zaunk xakta. Udharonnak, Chennai-ntlea pradeshik pasport ofisacho pot'to "Rayala Towers, 47 Whites Road, Royapettah, Chennai - 600014" asa, punn Delhi ofisacho pot'to purnoponnan veglloso astolo. Tumchea kodden sarkho asa kai te don fautt check korat!
normalised: Tech bhaxen, sarkarachim kacheram bhinn-bhinn shakha vo pradeshik kacheri asunk xokta hem ugddas dovrat. Mukhel kacherichea khatir pot'to tumchea sthanik shakhe khatir asa tea von veglo zaunk xokta. Udahoronnak, Chennai-chea pradeshik passport kacheri "Rayala Towers, forty seven Whites Road, Royapettah, Chennai - so xem hozar ani chaudda" hanga asa, punn Delhichea kachericho pot'to puro veglo astolo. Tumchea lagim boro asa tem duball-check korat!

unnormalised: Nimannem, zori tumi khoreanich addkleat, tor tumi tanchya helpline-ak kall korunk vo nikatchea lok mahiti kendrak bhett diunk xakta. Kednaim tanchem tumkam zai to pot'to sodunk modot korunk xakta vo tumkam sarkhea vibhagant margdarshan korunk xakta. Tumkam zai tem mellounk subhechha!
normalised: Nimannem, tum khorench adkholle zalear, tum tankam tankanche helpline-ak phone korunk vo lagimchea lok mahiti kendrak bhett divunk xoktat. Ked'dam-i tankam tumkam zai to pot'to sodunk modot korunk xokta vo sarkhea vibhagak tumkam margdorxon korunk xokta. Tumkam zai tem sodunk tumkam subhechha!
